item.title: Nintendo of America President Doug Bowser is Retiring
item.description:
On September 25, Nintendo announced that Doug Bowser would retire as President of Nintendo of America (NOA) effective December 31, 2025. Nintendo also confirmed that Bowser will be succeeded as NOA President by Devon Pritchard, the branch's current executive vice president of revenue, marketing, and consumer experience, starting January 1, 2026.

Bowser's upcoming retirement will take place over six years after he succeeded Reggie Fils-Aime as NOA's fourth President in April 2019. Before his time as Nintendo of America's President, Bowser served as the company's senior vice president of sales and marketing, where he oversaw the North American launch of the Nintendo Switch system in 2017. Bowser originally joined Nintendo of America in 2015, and became it's leader just four years later. Upon becoming NOA's President, Nintendo fans quickly pointed out that Bowser's last name is coincidentally shared with the Super Mario franchise's iconic antagonist.

Doug Bowser Is Calling It a Career

After overseeing the launch of the Switch 2, which sold over two million units in the US by late August 2025, Bowser's time with Nintendo will soon come to an end. According to Nintendo's press release on Business Wire, Bowser will retire as President and COO of Nintendo of America effective December 31, 2025. Nintendo also confirmed via a company announcement that Bowser's successor as NOA President has already been decided. Starting January 1, 2026, Devon Pritchard will begin her tenure as NOA's fifth President and will be the first woman to lead one of Nintendo's major divisions. Pritchard is currently NOA's EVP of revenue, marketing, and consumer experience, and will join the NOA board of directors upon becoming its President. Bowser posted a message on Twitter to confirm his upcoming retirement from Nintendo and congratulated Pritchard on her tenure. In response, Nintendo fans thanked Bowser for his time with the company.

Pritchard's tenure as NOA President will come at an interesting time for the company. Earlier in September, reports indicated that Nintendo of America was outsourcing approximately 200 customer support service contracts ahead of the winter holiday shopping season. Along with Bowser's retirement, Nintendo of America will have a new CEO starting on November 16, 2025. Longtime company executive Satoru Shibata, who has been with Nintendo since 1985, will soon step into the role of NOA's CEO, having previously served as the President of Nintendo of Europe from 2000 to 2018.

Bowser's tenure as NOA's President will end at just over six years, nearly half that of Fils-Aime's time at the post. With Pritchard set to make history, it remains to be seen how Nintendo of America's plans will change in 2026.

item.title: What to Expect from Diablo 4’s StarCraft Collab
item.description:
It is official: Diablo 4 is collaborating with StarCraft in Season 10. While many fans expected the IP collab from this season to be outside of Blizzard, Team 3 surprised players with one of the company’s core franchises instead, albeit one that has gotten little love in recent years. This new Diablo 4 crossover event is set to begin on September 26 and lasts for two weeks until October 10.

From cash shop bundles to Twitch Drops, it can be hard to keep the contents of this collaboration straight. Here is everything that is known about the Diablo 4 x StarCraft crossover ahead of the start of the event.

The Diablo 4 x StarCraft Collab Explained

Lots of Premium StarCraft Cosmetics in the Diablo 4 Cash Shop

Like it was in the Berserk collab, the Tejal’s Shop is front and center in this crossover. Each class in Diablo 4 gets an armor and weapon set bundle inspired by iconic StarCraft characters like Jim Raynor, Zeratul, and Kerrigan. Beyond these class-locked cosmetics, gamers can also get a Zergling Mount and a Hydralisk Companion, each coming with Mount Trophies and other goodies.

The prices for these bundles have not been officially released. These numbers have been derived from similar Diablo 4 bundles in the past, including the Berserk and World of Warcraft collaborations.

Class

Bundle

StarCraft Character

Weapon

Other

Estimated Price

  • Sterling (Hydralisk) Companion
  • Relic of Zerus Mount Trophy
  • Organism Unknown Emblem

2,800 Platinum ($25)

Some Free StarCraft Stuff for All Diablo 4 Fans

Luckily, not everything in the StarCraft collab will have a price tag. A weapon and emblem corresponding to one of the StarCraft factions can be picked up from the shop each day for the first three days of the collab. The Protoss set goes live alongside the event, with the Terran and Zerg duos coming on the next two days – but once they are added to the store, players will be able to pick them up for free for the duration of the crossover.

  • September 26
    • Ancient of the Void Emblem
    • Arm of the Purifier Mace

  • September 27
    • Forward until Dominion Emblem
    • Heat of Char Polearm

  • September 28
    • The Teeming Brood Emblem
    • Parasite Spitter Crossbow

Additionally, a new set of Twitch Drops will help celebrate the event as well. For the duration of the collaboration, fans can watch up to six hours of any Diablo 4 channel on Twitch to earn three more Emblems sporting the logos of each faction from the RTS.

  • 2 Hours: Forward unto Dominion (Terran) Emblem
  • 4 Hours: Ancient of the Void (Protoss) Emblem
  • 6 Hours: The Teeming Brood (Zerg) Emblem

The two sets of Emblems were referred to by the same names in the announcement blog, but one or the other will likely be called something different when they are made available.

No New StarCraft-Themed Diablo 4 Gameplay

Unfortunately, unlike the Berserk collaboration, or Diablo Immortal ’s crossover with Hearthstone , the Diablo 4 x StarCraft event will contain no gameplay aspects. All the cosmetics are either paid or free items from the cash shop or Twitch Drops, meaning there are no in-game events or activities that must be completed during the collaboration.

item.title: Fortnite Leak Teases Halloween Skins
item.description:
A new Fortnite leak suggests that at least 11 skins will be released for Halloween. Every year, Fortnite hosts a variety of events that introduce new cosmetics for players to get. However, Halloween is one of the most popular periods for players of the Epic Games title.

One of the reasons for this is the seasonal event Fortnitemares, which takes place during the Halloween season. Fortnitemares introduces new POIs, limited-time modes, and themed weapons. In 2024, Fortnite introduced Horde Rush mode and five new weapons, one of which was based on Billy from the Saw movie series. The highlight of the Halloween celebration, however, is the release of new scary cosmetics: in 2024, there were 12, including Leatherface, Sally from The Nightmare Before Christmas , and Mephisto, the iconic Marvel villain. Halloween is an exciting time with brand-new themed activities and cosmetics, and a leak gives Fortnite players a hint of what's coming in 2025.

Fortnite Will Get Several New Skins on Halloween, It Is Claimed

On Twitter, well-known Fortnite leaker Shiina claims that at least 11 skins will be released on Halloween 2025. According to the leak shared by them, Epic Games will add a Ghostface and Jason Vorhees skin, along with four or five Scooby-Doo outfits, presumably one for Scooby and others for his friends. The leak also hints at Fortnite getting a skin based on REPO , a popular horror game on Steam in which players team up to recover valuable items while fleeing from scary monsters.

  • Ghostface (1 skin)
  • Jason Voorhees (1 skin)
  • Scooby-Doo (4 to 5 skins)
  • REPO (1 skin)
  • Mothman (1 skin)
  • Butcher Pig (1 skin)
  • Grim Hound (Dire Remix) (1 skin)
  • Eternal Peely (1 skin)

The other part of the skins teased by the leak indicates cosmetics based on traditional Halloween creatures: the Mothman, and a werewolf with red chain marks, a jacket, and jeans with spikes called Grim Hound (Dire Remix). The list includes a skin called Pig Butcher and a new outfit for Peely, the popular Fortnite character. Named Eternal Peely, user FNAssist clarifies that this will be a brand-new cosmetic, and not the already known Peely Bone skin.

Shiina says there is a chance that Epic Games will add even more skins, but did not give further details on how many and what they might be. Meanwhile, FNAssist says that the Grim Hound outfit will be added in a future update for Fortnite OG Season 6, which is expected to kick off in early October. It is important to note that this information is speculation and should be taken with a grain of salt until an official announcement is made. Since October is not far off, it shouldn't be long before Fortnite players know more about this year's Halloween celebrations.

294
8.9 /10

item.title: All School Locker Codes in Silent Hill f (Puzzle Solution)
item.description:
Puzzles are a major part of Silent Hill f , and players will encounter a lot of them throughout their journey through this beautiful nightmare. While exploring the halls of Ebisugaoka Middle School, players will enter the locker rooms with locked units. You'll need to find different notes scattered around the building to decipher all the locker codes and solve the puzzle. Here's how to get all the locker codes in Silent Hill f .

How to Get All Locker Codes in Silent Hill f (Puzzle Solution)

Players can start the locker puzzle in Silent Hill f right after obtaining the second-floor classrooms key by completing the Secret Box puzzle. After exiting the puzzle box area, simply head to the locked classroom to your right (east).

After entering, you'll find the Old Annex Main Gate Key sitting on top of the teacher's podium .

Now, head downstairs and under the hallway that leads into the annex from the ground floor. Unlock the area and go left, into one of the open classrooms.

Inside, you'll find some notes mentioning ciphered text and a key to decipher this so-called "girl speak." Head to one of the desks in the classroom to get the Locker Room Key, and hint at Asakura's locker code inside her notebook. Do note that the hint for Asakura's locker code hint can vary based on the puzzle difficulty you've set.

Locker Puzzle Story Difficulty Hint

I'm a mermaid. The sea is calling out to me. I can't believe this school doesn't even have a pool!

The sea! THE SEA! The best thing in the world! It's so lovely, it's now my locker combination!

Locker Puzzle Hard Difficulty Hint

I'm a tortoise. The bus is calling out to me. I didn't get the news that school would be so far away!

Bus! BUS! The best thing in the world! I love it so much that I made it my locker combination!

Locker Puzzle Lost in the Fog Difficulty Hint

I decided to make the combo for my locker something I love!

You can poach it, fry it, and even boil it. No matter what, it always comes out delicious!

And if you add flour and sugar and mix them all together, you can make a cake!

Now, simply head down and unlock the door to the girls' Locker Room, which will let players access all other lockers that require three-digit codes to unlock. Here are all the locker codes, including the one for Asakura's locker that you'll need to progress the story further.

All Locker Codes in Silent Hill f

Since you'll need only Asakura Ayumi's locker code to complete the Locker puzzle in Silent Hill f , no other codes are affect by your selected puzzle difficulty and will remain the same as mentioned below.

Type

Student Name

Locker Codes

Locker Items

Required

Asakura Ayumi

Story : SEA (534)

Hard : BUS (865)

Lost in the Fog : EGG (399)

Key Cabinet Key

Optional

Aoi Takeshi

AOI (401)

Origami of Grievances (Hint to Suga's locker code)

Tsuchiya Taiko

377

Omamori Wolf (Deal additional damage with weapons having high durability)

Suga Yosie

SOS (505)

School Bag (Increases maximum inventory space by one.)

Where to Use the "Key Cabinet" Key

Once you obtain the Key Cabinet Key after solving the Locker puzzle in Silent Hill f , head back to the office next to the shoe racks to open the cabinet and get the Key to the Back Mountains . This will complete Hinako's search in the middle school, and players will progress to the next area in the game.

item.title: You Should Play These 8 Horror Games For Halloween (2025)
item.description:
Summary

  • Halloween 2025 horror roundup blends psychological, survival, multiplayer, and puzzle-driven jump-scare thrills.
  • Standout releases: Silent Hill f , Dying Light: The Beast , Alan Wake 2 , Resident Evil Village .
  • Co-op and indie hits to try: Phasmophobia for friends, Poppy Playtime for episodic puzzles and jump scares.

Every once in a while, it’s always nice to bring the hobby of gaming together with an upcoming holiday. Whether it be jumping into the Winterfest festivities for Christmas in Fortnite or celebrating the new year in Animal Crossing , gamers all around the world have a wide range of ways to enjoy a special occasion in their favorite video game.

However, with Halloween rapidly approaching, there is no better way to get into the spooky spirit than to boot up one of the scariest horror games available. While players are definitely spoiled for choice when it comes to the best horror games to play this Halloween, there are certainly some great ones. Here are the best horror games to play for Halloween 2025.

Poppy Playtime

Chilling Episodic Puzzle Horror Game

Poppy Playtime
9.1 /10
Released
October 12, 2021

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

Platform(s)
Android, iOS, Microsoft Windows
Powered by

Up first is Poppy Playtime , an episodic horror game that became a craze back in 2021. Players take on the role of an employee of Playtime Co., a toy manufacturing company. In the first chapter, they return to the abandoned Playtime Co. factory after all the other employees have mysteriously vanished, only to discover that things are not quite as they seem.

Poppy Playtime is a chilling and excellent horror experience, featuring fun yet tense puzzles and some genuinely terrifying jump scares. Fans of Five Nights at Freddy’s will likely enjoy Poppy Playtime , as it carries a similar style that some might even argue helped inspire it in the first place. There are currently four chapters available, with the fifth still in development and without a confirmed release date.

Dying Light: The Beast

Terrifying Zombie-Filled Open World Survival Game

Dying Light: The Beast
8 /10
7.8 /10
Released
September 19, 2025

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

Developer(s)
Techland
Franchise
Dying Light
Platform(s)
PC, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S
Powered by

There is some debate about whether Dying Light truly qualifies as a horror game, as it leans more toward open-world survival than pure horror. However, with the series’ signature over-the-top gore , hordes of undead, and terrifying monsters that emerge during the night cycles , it delivers an adrenaline-pumping experience that feels like a perfect fit for Halloween 2025.

The latest entry in the series is Dying Light: The Beast , which serves as the third standalone release. This game puts players back in the role of Kyle Crane from the first title , only this time following a series of experiments conducted on him after the events of Dying Light: The Following . With refined parkour, increased difficulty, awesomely unique weapons, and the return of those nightmare-fueled night sequences, Dying Light: The Beast may very well be the most frightening game of the year so far.

Phasmophobia

The Best Horror Multiplayer Game for Halloween 2025

Phasmophobia
9.3 /10
Released
October 29, 2024

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

ESRB
T For Teen // Blood, Use of Drugs, Violence
Developer(s)
Kinetic Games
Platform(s)
PC, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S
OpenCritic Rating
Strong
Powered by

Looking to celebrate Halloween 2025 with a few friends? Then Phasmophobia is the game to play. First released back in 2020, it remains widely popular today and continues to receive fresh updates that keep players engaged. For those unfamiliar, Phasmophobia is a 4-player co-op horror game where players become paranormal investigators tasked with identifying ghosts and spirits in haunted locations.

Players can venture into a variety of haunted locations, using a range of equipment to gather evidence. Once their investigation is complete, they must determine the type of spirit haunting the area to succeed . With chilling jump scares, a strong focus on teamwork, and an eerie atmosphere throughout, Phasmophobia may be the best horror game to play with friends. On top of that, with the Halloween Blood Moon Cult event set for October and a Winter’s Jest event planned for the holiday season, there has never been a better time to dive in.

Silent Hill f

Creepy Psychological Horror Set in Japan

Silent Hill f
10 /10
10 /10
Released
September 25, 2025

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

ESRB
Mature 17+ / Blood and Gore, Intense Violence, Partial Nudity
Developer(s)
Neobards Entertainment
Franchise
Silent Hill
Platform(s)
PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, PC
OpenCritic Rating
Mighty
Powered by

Next up is Silent Hill f , Silent Hill's next installment, which has arrived in time for Halloween 2025, just over a month prior. This eerie horror game takes a big departure from many of the other Silent Hill games , whisking players to 1960s Japan. Players take the role of Hinako, following the appearance of a strange fog in her hometown. As fans of the series may have already figured out, where there's fog, monsters soon follow.

With Silent Hill f comes a terrifying play session filled with disturbing monster designs, psychological thrills, difficult puzzles , and satisfying melee combat that will prove a challenge for those unprepared for the game's nightmarish enemies. For those looking for a new game to rack up the fear factor for Halloween 2025, Silent Hill f should definitely be on the to-play list.

Little Nightmares 3

Creepy Platform Puzzle Solving Adventure With Co-Op Play

Little Nightmares III
Puzzle
Platformer
Horror
Systems
Released
October 10, 2025

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

ESRB
Teen / Blood and Gore, Violence
Developer(s)
Supermassive Games
Franchise
Little Nightmares
Platform(s)
PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch 2, Nintendo Switch, PC
Powered by

From brutally creepy to downright uncanny, we now have Little Nightmares 3 , the third installment in the series that launched back in 2017. Little Nightmares 3 comes from the creative minds at Supermassive Games, who are actually the sole developers of the project following Tarsier Studios' departure from the series. Luckily, the game is slated to arrive just in time for Halloween 2025 , with its release date set for October 10.

Little Nightmares 3 follows suit with the previous two games, taking players through a platforming, puzzle-solving adventure where all kinds of horrors await. Players assume the roles of Low and Alone in their journey to escape the world of Nowhere. With a demo already available, along with co-op play , Little Nightmares 3 is absolutely a game that players should keep on their radar for this Halloween.

Alan Wake 2

Eerie Suspenseful Thriller

Alan Wake 2
5 /10
28
8.4 /10
Released
October 27, 2023

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

ESRB
M For Mature 17+ Due To Blood and Gore, Intense Violence, Nudity, Strong Language
Developer(s)
Remedy Entertainment
Publisher(s)
Epic Games
Franchise
Alan Wake
Platform(s)
PC, PS5, Xbox Series S, Xbox Series X
Powered by

Alan Wake 2 is the highly anticipated sequel to a horror game that fans have loved ever since its original debut back in 2010, and it absolutely delivers as an excellent horror game for fans to pick up again this upcoming Halloween. Alan Wake 2 has players assuming the role of a horror fiction writer trapped in his own story , desperately trying to escape, along with FBI Agent Saga Anderson, who is investigating a string of murders that claimed the life of former FBI Agent Robert Nightingale.

Alan Wake 2 brings back the hauntingly chilling small-town US occult/paranormal aesthetic, partnered with terrifying enemies, trippy puzzles , and combat that remains both satisfying and challenging. With a rich story and plenty of scares to uncover, Alan Wake 2 should definitely be a horror game players pick up this spooky season, even if they have not played the first game.

Five Nights at Freddy's: Secret of the Mimic

Terrifying Horror Game From the World of FNAF

Five Nights at Freddy's: Secret of the Mimic
7.4 /10
Released
June 13, 2025

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

Developer(s)
Steel Wool Studios
Publisher(s)
Steel Wool Studios
Franchise
Five Nights at Freddy's
Platform(s)
PlayStation 5, PlayStation VR2, PC
Powered by

Halloween wouldn’t be complete without mentioning Five Nights at Freddy’s , easily one of the most iconic horror series out there. While there are plenty of great entries to revisit, from Five Nights at Freddy’s: Sister Location to the original game that started it all, this Halloween 2025 is the perfect time to try Five Nights at Freddy’s: Secret of the Mimic .

Secret of the Mimic takes a big departure from the classic formula. Instead of the single-room setup of surviving five nights at Freddy Fazbear’s, this entry features a linear story where players step into the shoes of a technician investigating the disappearance of their contractor inside an abandoned factory. Expect run-ins with terrifying animatronics, including the infamous Mimic. With a deeper narrative, puzzles to solve, multiple endings, and plenty of spooky scares , Five Nights at Freddy’s: Secret of the Mimic is an excellent choice for Halloween.

Resident Evil Village

Eerie Horror with Terrifying Foes to Face

Resident Evil Village
8 /10
24
9.0 /10
Released
May 7, 2021

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
M for Mature: Blood and Gore, Intense Violence, Strong Language
Developer(s)
Capcom
Franchise
Resident Evil
Platform(s)
PS4, PS5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, Stadia, PC, Nintendo Switch 2
OpenCritic Rating
Mighty
Powered by

Finalizing this list is an entry from Resident Evil . While players diving into the franchise are definitely spoiled for choice when it comes to seriously good horror games, from entries like Resident Evil 2 to Resident Evil Biohazard , those who have not already given Resident Evil Village a go will not be disappointed , especially if they pick it up in time for this year's Halloween festivities.

Resident Evil Village may not be the most terrifying of the series’ long line of installments, but it’s definitely up there. Players take on the role of Ethan Winters following the events of Biohazard , heading to a mysterious village in search of his kidnapped daughter. With creepy locations, terrifying creatures, iconic characters, and a stunning environment , those looking to take their terrors head-on with a shotgun will definitely love Resident Evil Village .
